dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: HAHAHA! Oh, give me a break! So, uh, Tokayev, right? From Kazakhstan? Yeah, Tokayev. What now, another, like, diplomatic tea party?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: H A H A H A! Oh, give me a break! So, uh, Tokayev, right? From Kazakhstan? Yeah, Tokayev. What now, another, like, diplomatic tea party?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Heads of State discussed the prospects for deepening trade and economic cooperation between Kazakhstan and Israel...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he just had a phone call with, um, Israel's President Herzog.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he just had a phone call with, um, Israel's President Herzog.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev held a telephone conversation with Israeli President Isaac Herzog, according to Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Herzog? Really? What was the big emergency? To wish him a happy Tuesday?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Herzog? Really? What was the big emergency? To wish him a happy Tuesday?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: No, actually, uh, Herzog called to congratulate him on Nauryz. Itâ€™s a holiday. And it was Israel who initiated it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, actually, uh, Herzog called to congratulate him on Nauryz. It's a holiday. And it was Israel who initiated it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the conversation, which took place at the initiative of the Israeli side, Isaac Herzog congratulated Kassym-Jomart Tokayev on the upcoming holiday of Nauryz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, Israel initiated it. Right. Of course they did. What did they really want?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, Israel initiated it. Right. Of course they did. What did they really want?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: They discussed, like, deepening trade and, uh, economic cooperation, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They discussed, like, deepening trade and, uh, economic cooperation, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Heads of State discussed the prospects for deepening trade and economic cooperation between Kazakhstan and Israel...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: "Deepening cooperation." Is that code for, like, "we need something from you"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Deepening cooperation. Is that code for, like, we need something from you?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, they just confirmed their, um, readiness to maintain high-level, mutually beneficial ties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, they just confirmed their, um, readiness to maintain high-level, mutually beneficial ties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...confirming their readiness to continue to maintain a high level of bilateral mutually beneficial ties.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: "Mutually beneficial." For who, B? Always for who?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mutually beneficial. For who, B? Always for who?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: And get this: President Herzog is gonna visit Kazakhstan within a year!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this: President Herzog is gonna visit Kazakhstan within a year!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: An agreement was reached that the Israeli President will visit Kazakhstan within a year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, a visit. That'll, like, solve everything, won't it? Just show up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, a visit. That'll, like, solve everything, won't it? Just show up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a big deal! And remember, Tokayev just met a US congresswoman too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a big deal! And remember, Tokayev just met a U S congresswoman too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It was previously reported that Tokayev received a congresswoman from the United States.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: A congresswoman. Singular. Not, like, the whole US government. So, what, Kazakhstan's suddenly the center of the universe?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A congresswoman. Singular. Not, like, the whole U S government. So, what, Kazakhstan's suddenly the center of the universe?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, it's, uh, important, right? Geopolitically?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, it's, uh, important, right? Geopolitically?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker A
dialogue_turns.text: Geopolitically important to get a congratulatory phone call. That's, like, a really low bar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Geopolitically important to get a congratulatory phone call. That's, like, a really low bar.
